Title: Stakes Part 2: Everything Stays
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Hanna Nystrom, Adam Muto, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Olivia Olson, Ava Acres
Plot: As the sun rises on her last day, Marceline recalls her long extraordinary life.
